    "### Task 1 : Prediction using Supervised ML (Predicting percentage of student based on the no. of study hours)"

    "from sklearn.metrics import r2_score\n",
    "from sklearn.metrics import mean_absolute_error"

   "source": [
    "# Reading the Data\n",
    "\n",
    "data = pd.read_csv('http://bit.ly/w-data')\n",
    "print(\"Data imported!\")\n",

    "data.head(10)"

   "id": "proper-priest",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Plotting The Graph"

  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "id": "developmental-links",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {

   "source": [
    "# Plotting the distribution of scores\n",
    "\n",
    "data.plot(x='Hours', y='Scores', style='o')  \n",
    "plt.title('Hours vs Percentage', size=20)  \n",
    "plt.xlabel('No. of hours Studied')  \n",
    "plt.ylabel('Percentage Scores') \n",
    "plt.grid()\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "allied-house",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Training The Model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "id": "silent-three",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "#Splitting training and testing data\n",
    "x=data.iloc[:,:-1].values\n",
    "y=data.iloc[:,1].values\n",
    "x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test= train_test_split(x, y,train_size=0.80,test_size=0.20,random_state=0)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "id": "conventional-ceramic",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression\n",
    "linearRegressor= LinearRegression()\n",
    "linearRegressor.fit(x_train, y_train)\n",
    "y_predict= linearRegressor.predict(x_train)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "id": "flexible-seventh",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Training complete.\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "regressor = LinearRegression()  \n",
    "regressor.fit(x_train, y_train) \n",
    "\n",
    "print(\"Training complete.\")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "further-parks",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Linear Regression Model"
   ]
  },
  {

     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Plotting the regression line\n",
    "line = regressor.coef_*x+regressor.intercept_\n",
    "# Plotting for the test data\n",
    "plt.title('Linear Regression Plot', size=20) \n",
    "plt.ylabel('Marks Percentage')\n",
    "plt.xlabel('Hours Studied')\n",
    "plt.scatter(x, y)\n",
    "plt.plot(x, line);\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
